title: Trump-linked lobbyists are having a hopping good time
summary: Trump-affiliated lobbying firms like Ballard Partners and Mercury Public Affairs posted massive Q1 profits, fueled by a surge of clients seeking influence in his second term – including organizations targeted by the administration and those looking for tariff carve outs
